description: Demolition of existing buildings, groundworks and construction of a 10 storey building providing 54 new residential units (Use Class C3) with associated 345sqm of flexible retail/commercial floorspace (within Use Classes A1/A2/A3/A4/B1/D1/D2), the creation of bus loop and new pedestrian routes together with associated access, servicing, cycle parking and landscaping (amended description and amended red line site plan).
